divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my friend home. then i looked up and seen a aircraft with 3 or 4 orange circular lights made up in a triangle going in a straight line really quick. it then slowed down and changed direction. the lights seemed to fade then the craft came to a complete stop then floated behind the tree line.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Bryson City
There were no other sightings in Bryson City on or around March 4th 2013
